org.springframework.messaging.handler.annotation

注释类型 MessageExceptionHandler


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
public @interface MessageExceptionHandler
    Annotation for handling exceptions thrown from message-handling methods within a specific handler class.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0
    作者:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

    • 可选元素概要

      可选元素 
      限定符和类型 可选元素和说明
      java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable>[] value
      Exceptions handled by the annotated method.

    • 元素详细资料

      • value

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Throwable>[] value
        Exceptions handled by the annotated method. If empty, will default to any exceptions listed in the method argument list.
        默认值:
        {}
